revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Iceberg Ruins |image = [[File:Iceberg Ruins.png|thumb]] |caption = A map of Iceberg Ruins. |tokens = 1,920,000 |location = North of Snowslide Slope }} '''Iceberg Ruins''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Galar]]. It initially has 125 tiles arranged in two floors: 10x10 and 6x6 in size, respectively; including 16 chest tiles, 38 non-boss encounter tiles, 1 ladder tile, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 31,507,840 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | {{Pokemon|Cryogonal}} || colspan=2 rowspan=8| <center> N/A |- | {{Pokemon|Beartic}} |- | {{Pokemon|Galarian Darumaka}} |- | {{Pokemon|Weavile}} |- | {{Pokemon|Vanilluxe}} |- | {{Pokemon|Froslass}} |- | {{Pokemon|Delibird}} |- | '''{{Pokemon|Aurorus}}*''' |}
'''*Note:''' Aurorus will only appear if the player has captured it previously.
===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | {{Pokemon|Glalie}} || <center>149,662,240 || colspan=3 rowspan=2|<center>N/A |- | '''{{Pokemon|Regice}}*'''|| <center>157,539,200 |}
'''*Note:''' Must have made progress in [[Questlines#The_Ancient_Golems|The Ancient Golems]] Questline to unlock.
==Items== <tabs> <tab name="Base"> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !!
